attributes.additional_details:
Calling on the Prime Minister to support the Israelites and stand by the commandments of the Lord God of the Bible to help prevent the division of the Holy Land this September 2011.

The Lord gave the land of Israel to the Israelites over four thousand years ago to keep forever and that was what He did.  (Genesis 17:7-8)

Anyone/nation involves in dividing the Holy Land will pay a heavy price (Obadiah 1:15)

It is God who owns the land of Israel - He gives it to whoever He wishes. (Act 17:24)

Psalm 125:2 as the mountains surround Jerusalem, so the Lord surrounds his people both now and forevermore.
